alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:02PM MST until December 13 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County/Monument Ridge/Rampart Range Below 7500 Feet, and the Palmer Divide. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
